comment._content: Fantastic image, a piece of history

comment.author: 98626781@N08
comment._content: It appears that this stereo image is arranged as a "cross view", if the images were reversed it would be "parallel view".  If it were viewed in a device, such as a stereopticon, it would need to be "parallel view".
